comment.author: 13935339@N05
comment._content:
One of the former Project EXTRAVERSION YP-80As, serial 44-83028. Along with serial 44-83029, both birds had been deployed to Italy in the closing months of the war for operational testing - NO COMBAT.

The fascinating thing is his attention to detail, particularly in the colors. this painting is a boon to historians and modelers, as only B&W photography has ever been published on this bird...
